prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered howling pose with head tilted toward lunar geometry, chibi proportions with flowing water-drop shaped head with rippling edges and construction paper layers suggesting continuous flow through layered cut-out waves with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating Vesica Piscis, Wave interference patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth, elaborate with shifting Water element curved motifs and descending patterns and Flower of Life emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions with ethereal spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like rippling water wisps and droplet particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor DOAGNIS's profile: 'She who comes without a name', Aethyr ARN, Water element, Tarot The Moon, Sephirot Yesod, Zodiac Pisces, embodying the essence: 'When DOAGNIS is near, assistance arrives without fanfare an anonymous blessing, answers slipping in ...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered howling pose with head tilted toward lunar geometry
visual_elements.head_shape: flowing water-drop shaped head with rippling edges and construction paper layers
visual_elements.body_style: undulating form with wave-like contours, flattened with sharpie-like flow lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting continuous flow through layered cut-out waves with drawn depth

outfit.base: fluid draped garments with wave geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for flow and depth
outfit.details: Water element curved motifs and descending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: rippling water wisps and droplet particles

visual_elements.accessory: lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'She who comes without a name'
profile_data.essence: When DOAGNIS is near, assistance arrives without fanfare an anonymous blessing, answers slipping in without name or notice.
profile_data.angelic_role: Dominion of Nameless Grace; guides waveborne angels.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent, mercurial figure that shifts between crystalline membrane and liquid consciousness, embodying the liminal nature of water and the ARN Aethyr's mysterious boundary between seen and unseen realms
profile_data.color_reasoning: Silver-blue represents lunar consciousness of Yesod, water's reflective quality, and the Moon card's mysterious transformation; pearl-white signifies spiritual purity and the liminal boundary of consciousness
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Vesica Piscis symbolizes birth and intersection of consciousness, wave interference patterns represent quantum potential and hidden dimensional interactions
